One <S%G1520><s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G406>Andrew,<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter's<s%> <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%>
